content: this text is about a legal case in croatia referred to as case n° rev 8842005 which has reached the supreme court the case involves a property dispute and the termination of coownership the coowners of the property are identified as jb n and ah r the defendant ah is ordered to pay jb a compensation amount of 10830200 croatian kuna for their share of the coownership the plaintiff jb requested the termination of coownership based on a previous court decision and the inability to divide the property the termination takes into account the investments made by the coowner to increase the value of the property unauthorized agency rules apply when a coowner undertakes activities regarding the property without consent
